metadata.title: CVE-2018-18827 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: There exists a heap-based buffer over-read in ff_vc1_pred_dc in vc1_block.cin Libav 12.3, which allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service via acrafted aac file.

criterions.comment: qtwebengine-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
vlc package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
gst-libav1.0 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
